sig_info: Critical Hits deal 10.04 to 20% of hit damage as a burst of Physical Damage. This ability is based on hit damage before checking Block Proficiency, Armor and Resistances.
Shang-Chi can perform Critical Hits through the Opponent’s Block. Personal abilities that trigger on Critical Hits will trigger through Block.
